item.title: Publications
item.description: 2021 Publications Y. Kim, C. J. K. Richardson, E. Waks, and J.-H. Kim, “Temporal shaping of single photons by engineering exciton dynamics in a single quantum dot,” APL Photonics 6, 080801 (2021). D. Aiello, D. D. Awschalom, H. Bernien, T. Brower-Thomas, K. R.
